Html:
1. I do understand that google maps api do provide a feature that resolves your IP address and finds out your location.

Does Gmap has this feature? what steps do i need to do to integrate this feature?

 

2. Is it possible to draw an arbiturary line on the screen?

I know you can set 2 points and draw a route, but i can't find a method to draw a arbituary line on the screen even though you obviously need that to draw a route

1. i shall add thi function soon if it's really posible
  2. yes you use route with two points, if you want custom line, overide protected virtual void DrawRoutes(Graphics g) in GMapOverlay or if you use WPF: public Path CreateRoutePath(List<System.Windows.Point> localPath) in GMapControl
